code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl="/api/persons";var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var newPerson=function newPerson(person){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,person);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){throw err;});};var remove=function remove(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return;};var changePhone=function changePhone(id,newPerson){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newPerson);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,newPerson:newPerson,remove:remove,changePhone:changePhone};
